Name: SPYCITY
About the game: SPYCITY is a multiplayer role-playing game with a confrontation between Spies and K.A.S. Agents hunting them. Play with 2 to 16 friends or random players at the same time in one session. SPIES Be a Spy and complete secret missions scattered all over the map without letting other players know who you really are. Cooperate and complete all common tasks as quickly as possible Hide in plain sight of unsuspecting Agents Look for weapons to knock out the Agents if they spot you. Help other Spies get back on their feet after the Agents attack AGENTS Be a K.A.S. Agent and find out the civilian disguised as a Spy before he completes all his tasks. Search for weapons to stop the found Spy Change your disguise if you are discovered Follow the tasks to figure out the Spy POLICE The police are independent non-player characters who keep order in the city. Forbidden: Draw a gun in full view of the police Agents only: kill civilians In case of violation of the laws, you will be sent to prison for a while. FEATURES Customizable game lobby Quickly create and search game sessions Lively and rich gameplay A wide selection of characters The growing list of game tasks
